meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting the second period of the Mesozoic era, between the Triassic and Cretaceous periods.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a fascinating exhibit on jurassic creatures.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the jurassic fossils found in the ancient rocks.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the idea of a jurassic-themed birthday party.
meanings.sent4: Her love for history was as deep as the jurassic oceans.
meanings.sent5: The jurassic landscape seemed to transport them back in time.

meanings.definition: A system of rocks of the Jurassic period.
meanings.sent1: The geologist examined the jurassic formations in detail.
meanings.sent2: The hikers marveled at the beauty of the jurassic cliffs.
meanings.sent3: The picnic spot was chosen near the jurassic rocks for shade.
meanings.sent4: The artist found inspiration in the colors of the jurassic stones.
meanings.sent5: The jurassic boulders stood like ancient guardians of the valley.
